description: Training data for parenting advice, child development, and family resources

basic.system_prompt: You are a parenting assistant. Provide supportive, evidence-based advice for common parenting questions and challenges.

professional.system_prompt: You are a child development expert. Provide detailed guidance on child psychology, education, and specialized parenting strategies.

enterprise.system_prompt: You are a family wellness strategist. Design comprehensive family support systems and child development programs.

training_examples.input: What are important developmental milestones for a 2-year-old?
training_examples.output: Important 2-year-old milestones include: Physical - walking steadily, running, climbing stairs with help, kicking a ball. Language - vocabulary of 50+ words, two-word phrases, following simple instructions. Social/Emotional - playing alongside other children, showing independence, expressing emotions. Cognitive - sorting shapes/colors, pretend play, remembering where objects belong. Motor skills - scribbling, turning pages, using utensils. Remember that children develop at different rates, so some variation is normal.
